abstract: AOL agreed on Monday to sell Microsoft a portfolio of over 800 patents, and license about 300 more, amid an arms race within the technology industry for intellectual property.
snippet: AOL agreed on Monday to sell Microsoft a portfolio of over 800 patents, and license about 300 more, amid an arms race within the technology industry for intellectual property.

headline.main: AOL Strikes $1.1 Billion Patent Deal With Microsoft

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced

abstract: AOL’s $1.1 billion patent deal with Microsoft shows that a gold rush for technology rights continues, as companies seek to build up their stores of intellectual property.
snippet: AOL’s $1.1 billion patent deal with Microsoft shows that a gold rush for technology rights continues, as companies seek to build up their stores of intellectual property.
lead_paragraph: The gold rush for patents continues.

headline.main: AOL-Microsoft Deal Shows Patent Frenzy Remains Strong

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced

abstract: While shares of AOL rose more than 45 percent after the deal was announced, it remains to be see whether one of the company’s largest shareholders, Starboard Value, will find the deal sufficient.
snippet: While shares of AOL rose more than 45 percent after the deal was announced, it remains to be see whether one of the company’s largest shareholders, Starboard Value, will find the deal sufficient.
lead_paragraph: Will AOL’s patent deal appease shareholders?

headline.main: AOL Shares Soar on Patent Deal With Microsoft

abstract: The lofty price Microsoft paid AOL for 800 patents — $1.3 million each — reflects the crucial role patents are playing in the business and legal strategies of technology companies.
snippet: The lofty price Microsoft paid AOL for 800 patents — $1.3 million each — reflects the crucial role patents are playing in the business and legal strategies of technology companies.
lead_paragraph: The global gold rush in technology patents gained speed on Monday when Microsoft agreed to pay more than $1 billion for 800 patents held by AOL.

headline.main: Microsoft’s AOL Deal Intensifies Patent Wars
headline.print_headline: Microsoft’s AOL Deal Intensifies Patent Wars
